data.name: Don't Starve Together: Beating Heart Chest
data.detailed_description:
Beating Heart Chest
Love is in the air in the world of Don’t Starve, and in this special Beating Heart Chest! Within this box you’ll find all three Valentine’s-themed skins, which can be used in-game in Don’t Starve Together. Spread the love!

Includes
  • Clement Life Amulet
  • Winged Brazier
  • Romantic Birdcage
  • Luxurious Stage Portrait
  • Resplendent Curtain Portrait
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: This Beating Heart Chest contains all Valentine's event skin items.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8
  • Processor: 1.7+ GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD5450 or better; 256 MB or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX9.0c compatible sound card and drivers

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Lion (OSX 10.7.X)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Intel
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia or ATI graphics card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional Notes: Not recommended for Intel GMA Graphics or Mac Minis or early-generation MacBooks

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 1.7+ GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD5450 or better; 256 MB or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
